template:
*__Plant Control System 1 \- Sensor Data__*

*Power Consumption*
Energy total\: {{pcs1_main_energy}} kWh
Power total\: {{pcs1_main_power}} W

*Amperage*
Kinematics\: {{pcs1_kin_current}} A
LED1 Hall A\: {{pcs1_led1_hall_a_current}} A
LED1 Hall B\: {{pcs1_led1_hall_b_current}} A
LED2 Hall A\: {{pcs1_led2_hall_a_current}} A
LED2 Hall B\: {{pcs1_led2_hall_b_current}} A
LED3 Hall A\: {{pcs1_led3_hall_a_current}} A
LED4 Hall A\: {{pcs1_led4_hall_a_current}} A

*Outside*
Temperature\: {{pcs1_outside_average_temperature}} °C

*Electronics Chamber*
Temperature\: {{pcs1_pwm_dallas_1_temperature}} °C
Temperature Power Adapter\: {{pcs1_pwm_dallas_24_36v_case_temperature}} °C
Temperature Kinematics Controller\: {{pcs1_kin_dallas_4_temperature}} °C

*LED Panel*
Temperature 40mm Fans\: {{pcs1_led_panel_fan_140mm_average_temperature}} °C
Temperature 80mm Fans\: {{pcs1_led_panel_fan_80mm_average_temperature}} °C
Temperature average\: {{pcs1_led_panel_average_temperature}} °C
Temperature max\: {{pcs1_led_panel_average_max_temperature}} °C

*Growth Chamber*
Temperature\: {{pcs1_growth_chamber_average_humidity}} °C
Humidity\: {{pcs1_growth_chamber_average_temperature}} \%
Illuminance\: {{pcs1_growth_chamber_average_illuminance}} lx
Illuminance max\: {{pcs1_growth_chamber_average_max_illuminance}} lx

*Water tank*
Temperature\: {{pcs1_as_rtd}} °C
PH\-Value\: {{pcs1_as_ph}}
Conductivity\: {{pcs1_as_ec}} μS\/cm

*Kinematics*
Global angle\: {{pcs1_kin_stepper_angle}}
Plant gear angle\: {{pcs1_kin_stepper_plant_gear_rotation_angle}}
Number of cycles\: {{pcs1_kin_stepper_number_of_cycles}}
